sentences.en: A police car drew abreast of us and signalled us to stop.
sentences.cn: 一辆警车开过来与我们并排，示意我们停下来。

sentences.en: As he drew abreast of the man he pretended to stumble.
sentences.cn: 当他赶上那个男人时，他装出了要跌倒的样子。

sentences.en: As the car drew abreast of him, Jack suddenly recognised the driver.
sentences.cn: 那辆车追上来与杰克并行时，他一下子就认出了驾车的人。

sentences.en: As they reached the start-finish line Prost jinked right and drew abreast.
sentences.cn: 当他们接近起止线时，普罗斯特猛向右转，两辆车并排驶过了终点。

sentences.en: Ellen would keep me abreast of the progress by phone.
sentences.cn: 埃伦会通过电话及时向我通报进展情况。
五辆汽车排成一行停靠.

sentences.en: He will be keeping abreast of the news.
sentences.cn: 他将时刻关注最新消息。

sentences.en: Read the papers if you want to keep abreast of time.
sentences.cn: 如果你想跟上时代就要看报.

sentences.en: She kept abreast with the flood of communications that had poured in.
sentences.cn: 她及时回复如雪片般飞来的大批信件.

sentences.en: The bridge can take four lorries abreast.
sentences.cn: 这座大桥可容4辆卡车并列通行.

sentences.en: They walked two or three abreast.
sentences.cn: 他们三三两两地并肩行走.

sentences.en: This building is abreast with the tip of the island.
sentences.cn: 这幢建筑物与该岛的尖端齐头.

sentences.en: We should keep abreast with the present state of science.
sentences.cn: 我们应当赶上现代科学的发展.

sentences.en: We'll keep you abreast of developments.
sentences.cn: 我们会随时告知你最新进展。

phrases.tran_cn: 与……并驾齐驱；了解……的最新情况
保持与…并列；不落后于；跟上

trans.tran_en: to walk, ride etc next to each other, all facing the same way
